topic: How to document ETL jobs using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to document ETL jobs using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Documenting ETL Jobs using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to effectively document Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) jobs when developing them using FastAPI and Python 3.12+. By following best practices for documentation, your ETL processes will be easier to understand, maintain, and collaborate on.
key_points: Write clear and concise descriptions for API endpoints
Incorporate example requests and responses in the API documentation
Use markdown formatting to enhance readability
Add contextual information, such as database schema or data source details

code_examples.code:
```
from fastapi import FastAPI, APIRouter
router = APIRouter()

@router.get('/example-etl')
def example_etl():
    # ETL job details here
    pass 
app.include_router(router)
```

version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required to leverage the new FastAPI features mentioned in this guide.
Some of the examples may need adjustments for older versions of FastAPI.
caveats: FastAPI's built-in documentation functionality may not cover every aspect of your ETL job, so additional documentation outside the API is often necessary.
Always ensure that sensitive data is properly obfuscated or removed from any publicly accessible documentation.
